question: Word of Mouth (Buzz)
response: When the product has been tried by early customers, the best thing to do next is to ask them to spread the word.
They can do so by sharing your product in their verbal communication with family and friends.
They can also use media channels like social media, mobile communication, or digital communication (website, newsletters) to share your product.

question: Can you think of an example of this kind of marketing?
response: For example, you can share when you meet friends at a birthday party, or promote using personal newsletters.
